shortDescription.text: [GO-2024-2472] Go package github.com/notaryproject/notation configured with permissive trust policies potentially susceptible to rollback attack from compromised registry

fullDescription.text: Go package github.com/notaryproject/notation configured with permissive trust policies potentially susceptible to rollback attack from compromised registry

help.text: Go package github.com/notaryproject/notation configured with permissive trust policies potentially susceptible to rollback attack from compromised registry

shortDescription.text: [GO-2025-3487] Potential denial of service in golang.org/x/crypto

fullDescription.text: Potential denial of service in golang.org/x/crypto

help.text: SSH servers which implement file transfer protocols are vulnerable to a denial of service attack from clients which complete the key exchange slowly, or not at all, causing pending content to be read into memory, but never transmitted.

shortDescription.text: [GO-2025-3553] Excessive memory allocation during header parsing in github.com/golang-jwt/jwt

fullDescription.text: Excessive memory allocation during header parsing in github.com/golang-jwt/jwt

help.text: Excessive memory allocation during header parsing in github.com/golang-jwt/jwt
